RESTAURANT PROPOSAL

BUSINESS TRAVEL

From September 15th to 20th, 2019

Following you will find some nice restaurant suggestions walking distance from Hotel Barceló Sants but, as it is not a central hotel the restaurant offer in the area is small, that’s why I am including a second label with restaurants that are located in other areas of the city but I think it worth to have a bus transfer.

Walking Distance restaurants

Abrassame

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 45€ VAT inc

Bodega Monumental

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 43€ VAT inc

Quinto Quinta

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 40€ VAT inc

MinE

I am waiting their answer - I will be able to have an answer by the end of August

Menus from 44€ VAT inc

Pan&Oli

I am waiting their answer - I will be able to have an answer next week

Non Walking Distance restaurants

We would like to suggest some special restaurants, all of them are very good restaurants with something special: the location, the atmosphere, the food…

Mirabé haswonderful city views, Julivert Meu and Can Travi Nou is one of the best traditional catalan food in the city…

Alba Granados

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 49€ VAT inc

Arros i Peix

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 51€ VAT inc

Cal Pinxo Palau de Mar

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 52,50€ VAT inc

Can Travi Nou

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 54€ VAT inc

Casa Carmen

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 55€ VAT inc

Julivert Meu

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 44€ VAT inc

Mirabé

Rates per peron: Menu including starters to share + main course + dessert + drinks + coffee, from 53€ VAT inc

Transfer Rates

* 50 seater bus transfer from Airport to Hotel Barceló Sants (from 8.00h to 20.00h): 215€ VAT inc
* 50 seaters bus at disposal for dinner: 440€ VAT inc

Terms & Conditions

  • Rates valid for 2019.

  • Net rates for Business Travel

  • For a group of minimum 30 pax.

  • Cutting Edge Events management fee including in the detailed rates

  • VAT included.

  • No reservation has been done.
